subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Chris Wright scored a season-high 24 points, and No. 13 Georgetown (17-5, 6-4 Big East) won its fifth straight despite blowing an 11-point second-half lead at home.
snippet: Chris Wright scored a season-high 24 points, and No. 13 Georgetown (17-5, 6-4 Big East) won its fifth straight despite blowing an 11-point second-half lead at home.
